title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Weapon used, and Number of assaults in each Weapon used on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Other weapon where Number of assaults is 223997.0.
The lowest category is found at Knife or cutting instrument where Number of assaults is 123253.0.
The highest value at Other weapon is almost 1.82 times larger than the minimum value of Knife or cutting instrument.
The highest value at Other weapon is almost 1.82 times larger than the minimum value of Knife or cutting instrument.
The difference between the max Weapon used Other weapon and min Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument is 100744.0.
